publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4794 Jim Mather: Congratulations to Standard Life—That the Parliament commends the management and staff of Standard Life on emulating Cairn Energy, HBOS, the Royal Bank of Scotland, Scottish and Newcastle, Scottish Power and Scottish and Southern Energy as a Scottish-based company entering the FTSE 100; recognises that these Scottish-based businesses are currently valued at a total of £129 billion, accounting for 9% of the total index by capitalisation; commits itself to playing its part by creating conditions that will help Standard Life to strengthen its position as one of the United Kingdom’s leading financial service companies and thereby underpin the future of the company’s highly skilled workforce and its continued and valued presence in Edinburgh.

S2M-4794 Congratulations to Standard Life (lodged on 13 September 2006) Michael Matheson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Brian Adam*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Christine Grahame*, Stewart Stevenson*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-4794 Jim Mather: Congratulations to Standard Life—That the Parliament commends the management and staff of Standard Life on emulating Cairn Energy, HBOS, the Royal Bank of Scotland, Scottish and Newcastle, Scottish Power and Scottish and Southern Energy as a Scottish-based company entering the FTSE 100; recognises that these Scottish-based businesses are currently valued at a total of £129 billion, accounting for 9% of the total index by capitalisation; commits itself to playing its part by creating conditions that will help Standard Life to strengthen its position as one of the United Kingdom’s leading financial service companies and thereby underpin the future of the company’s highly skilled workforce and its continued and valued presence in Edinburgh. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Jamie Stone, Brian Adam, Roseanna Cunningham, Murray Tosh, Mr Andrew Welsh, Rob Gibson, Ms Maureen Watt, Christine Grahame, Stewart Stevenson, Bruce Crawford, Mr Adam Ingram, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, John Swinburne*
S2M-4794 Congratulations to Standard Life (lodged on 13 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4794 Congratulations to Standard Life (lodged on 13 September 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Nicola Sturgeon*
